articles.title: More than 100 million Americans will be exposed to extreme heat by 2053, mostly in the South and Midwest - CNBC
articles.description: Next year, about 50 U.S. counties, which are home to more than 8 million residents, are expected to feel heat index temperatures above 125 degrees Fahrenheit.
articles.content:

articles.description: The Blue Jays still hold the top wild-card spot in the American League, but are just 2.5 games ahead of the surprising Orioles, who are fourth in the race. The top three get playoff spots.
